title: New: Osca – Sleeptalk
body:
Jack Kenworthy undoubtedly has one of the finest lead vocals of current times; there’s a subtlety to it, yet at the same time, it has Chris Martin level of stadium readiness.

Whilst Osca’s debut EP hinted at the Coldplay comparisons, new track, _Sleeptalk_, could quite easily be a Rush of Blood era Coldplay song, and that’s meant in an entirely positive way. It’s expertly written and produced, and just begging to be played to thousands of adoring fans at some point in the near future. Check it out below.
